blog-no-posts: There are no blog posts yet . . .
forms-no-forms: There are no contact forms yet . . .
add-review-email: Your email address (won't appear in the reviews section)
name: Name
contact-text1: Well, I guess you have already found out some things about me and my travels. If you want us to have a chat and share travel stories, I would kindly ask you to fill the following form.
contact-text2: You will have to fill out some contact information, and also, your awesome story!
contact-text3: I am looking forward to hear from you :)

contact-question-5.question: What is your amazing travel story ?
contact-question-5.name: travelStory

error-invalid-url: The specified resource does not exist
submitted-text: The form has been submitted successfully

js-form-incomplete: You must answer all of the required questions
js-review-incomplete: Please complete all the fields in the review
js-remove-review-question: Are you sure about removing review #
